I can get all the last posts in one page done before they catch me.

"A prompt for the next person? I don't need to make a prompt for the next person!"

An overly plot-armored movie character that gets killed off because the company is desperate for attention and moneys.

"You aren't going to kill me for money aren't yo-"

A Brit colonising Africa

"It sure is nice being a soldier of the British Empire fighting against the Boers of the Transvaal Republi-"

Clone trooper (Star Wars) fighting against battle droids.

"They're just stupid droids, what ar- IS THAT A DROIDEKA???"

B-1 Battle droid (Star Wars) fighting against clone troopers

*Commander droid dies* "I guess I'm in charge now-"

TK Trooper fighting against the Bad Batch (all Star Wars)

We will just put this boat into our oversized blender. (Yt: how ridiculous)
